thread.title: Person Much Appreciated by Players, Thomas Kremser, Announces the 1st Event of the Brand-New TK Poker Tour
thread.title_full: Person Much Appreciated by Players, Thomas Kremser, Announces the 1st Event of the Brand-New TK Poker Tour

author: TK Poker Events
title: Person Much Appreciated by Players, Thomas Kremser, Announces the 1st Event of the Brand-New TK Poker Tour
text: · Instagram: https://instagram.com/tkpokertour/About the island: St. MaartenSt. Maarten, part of the Kingdom of the Netherlands, is a country on the southern part of a Caribbean island shared with Saint Martin, a French overseas collectivity located at the northern end of the Lesser Antilles, approximately 150 miles southeast of Puerto Rico. The island is just three hours from New York City and two hours forty-five minutes from Miami.Natural landscapes span lagoons, beaches and salt pans, while the capital, Philipsburg, has cobblestone streets and colorful, colonial-style buildings lining its Front Street shopping area. The port is a popular cruise-ship stop.For a wide vision of St. Maarten Island beauties, please visit:http://www.vacationstmaarten.com/About the venue: Sonesta Maho Beach Resort & CasinoThis limitless all-inclusive St Maarten resort is a spectacular “destination within a destination” offering endless activities for your enjoyment and relaxation. A large pool with cascading waterfalls, four tennis courts, a lively children’s program, a swim-up pool bar, five restaurants & bars, a casino, nightclub and much more.Sonesta Maho Beach Resort & Casino includes 1 large pool and kids pool, a swim-up bar, and a health spa on site. Diversions after sunset include the Casino Royale, and 40 shops and restaurants.Rooms feature balconies or ground-floor terraces and wireless Internet access. All Sonestas’ rooms are offer All-Inclusive services.For more details about the TKPT Caribbean venue, please visit:http://www.sonesta.com/mahobeachFor more details about the TKPT Caribbean schedule, please visit:http://tkpokertour.com/#scheduleBook your package before October 1st and receive your free cash game buy-inConditions to participate in “Early registration” TKPT Main Event Satellite on Nov. 25, 4pm· Winners gets entry to TKPT Main event for the value of $1.100· Qualification ends on October 1st, 2015· Who qualifies to play in this free roll?o Every player that buys the TKPT Main Event buy-in for $1.100 before October 1sto Every player that buys an Early Registration package before October 1sto Every player that qualifies in any satellite of our partner casinos and poker rooms (not limited till Oct 1st)For all the details about the TKPT Caribbean packages and reservation, please visit:http://tkpokertour.com/#packagesTKPT Caribbean - Official online and live satellitesThere are a multitude of routes available to secure your qualification for the TKPT Caribbean. You can play online with our poker room partner at any of the daily feeder satellites with buy-ins from €0.50 to €30 or buy directly into a satellite final for up to €200.§ Intertops – Please visit: https://poker.intertops.eu/de/promotions/§ Juicy Stakes – Please visit: https://juicystakes.eu/Promos/PokerPromos/TKPTStMaarten.aspxYou can play live satellite in our poker room partner clubs around Europe.§ Italy – Clubs Federazione Italiana Gioco Poker§ Czech Rep. - AŠ Casino
